verses.verse: Misery<WH480> is mine!<WH625> Indeed, I am like one who gathers the summer fruits,<WH7019> as gleanings<WH5955> of the vineyard:<WH1210> There is no cluster<WH811> of grapes to eat.<WH398> My soul<WH5315> desires<WH183> to eat the early fig.<WH1063>

The godly<WH2623> man has perished<WH6> out of the earth,<WH776> and there is no one upright<WH3477> among men.<WH120> They all lie in wait<WH693> for blood;<WH1818> every man<WH376> hunts<WH6679> his brother<WH251> with a net.<WH2764>

Their hands<WH3709> are on that which is evil<WH7451> to do it diligently.<WH3190> The ruler<WH8269> and judge<WH8199> ask<WH7592> for a bribe;<WH7966> and the powerful<WH1419> man dictates<WH1696> the evil<WH1942> desire<WH5315> of his soul.<WH5686> Thus they conspire together.

The best<WH2896> of them is like a brier.<WH2312> The most upright<WH3477> is worse than a thorn hedge.<WH4534> The day<WH3117> of your watchmen,<WH6822> even your visitation,<WH6486> has come;<WH935> now is the time of their confusion.<WH3998>

Don't<WH539> trust in a neighbor.<WH7453> Don't<WH982> put confidence in a friend.<WH7453> With the woman lying<WH7901> in your embrace,<WH2436> be careful<WH8104> of the words<WH6607> of your mouth!<WH6310>

For the son<WH1121> dishonors<WH5034> the father,<WH1> the daughter<WH1323> rises up<WH6965> against her mother,<WH517> the daughter-in<WH2545>-law against her mother-in<WH3618>-law; a man<WH376>'s enemies<WH341> are the men<WH582> of his own house.<WH1004>
But as for me,<WH6822> I will look to Yahweh.<WH3068> I will wait<WH3176> for the God<WH430> of my salvation.<WH3468> My God<WH430> will hear me.<WH8085>
Don't<WH8055> rejoice against me,<WH341> my enemy. When I fall,<WH5307> I will arise.<WH6965> When I sit<WH3427> in darkness,<WH2822> Yahweh<WH3068> will be a light to me.<WH216>

I will bear<WH5375> the indignation<WH2197> of Yahweh,<WH3068> because I have sinned<WH2398> against him,<WH7378> until he pleads my case,<WH7379> and executes<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> for me.<WH3318> He will bring me forth to the light.<WH216> I will see<WH7200> his righteousness.<WH6666>

Then my enemy<WH341> will see<WH7200> it,<WH955> and shame will cover<WH3680> her who said<WH559> to me,<WH3068> where is Yahweh your God?<WH430> Then my enemy will see<WH7200> me and will cover<WH5869> her shame.<WH4823> Now she will be trodden down like the mire<WH2916> of the streets.<WH2351>
A day<WH3117> to build<WH1129> your walls<WH1447>â€” In that day,<WH3117> he will extend<WH2706> your boundary.<WH7368>

In that day<WH3117> they will come<WH935> to you from Assyria<WH804> and the cities<WH5892> of Egypt,<WH4693> and from Egypt<WH4693> even to the River,<WH5104> and from sea<WH3220> to sea,<WH3220> and mountain<WH2022> to mountain.<WH2022>
Yet the land<WH776> will be desolate<WH8077> because of those who live<WH3427> in it,<WH6529> for the fruit of their doings.<WH4611>

Shepherd<WH7462> your people<WH5971> with your staff,<WH7626> the flock<WH6629> of your heritage,<WH5159> who live<WH7931> by themselves<WH910> in a forest,<WH3293> in the midst<WH8432> of fertile pasture<WH3760> land,<WH7462> let them feed; in Bashan<WH1316> and Gilead,<WH1568> as in the days<WH3117> of old.<WH5769>
"As in the days<WH3117> of your coming<WH3318> forth out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> I will show<WH7200> them marvelous things.<WH6381>"
The nations<WH1471> will see<WH7200> and be ashamed<WH954> of all their might.<WH1369> They will lay<WH7760> their hand<WH3027> on their mouth.<WH6310> Their ears<WH241> will be deaf.<WH2790>

They will lick<WH3897> the dust<WH6083> like a serpent.<WH5175> Like crawling things<WH2119> of the earth<WH776> they shall come trembling<WH7264> out of their dens.<WH4526> They will come with fear<WH3372> to Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> and will be afraid because of you.<WH3372>

Who is a God<WH410> like you,<WH5375> who pardons iniquity,<WH5771> and passes over<WH5674> the disobedience<WH6588> of the remnant<WH7611> of his heritage?<WH5159> He doesn't<WH2388> retain his anger<WH639> forever,<WH5703> because he delights<WH2654> in loving kindness.<WH2617>

He will again<WH7725> have compassion<WH7355> on us.<WH3533> He will tread our iniquities<WH5771> under foot;<WH7993> and you will cast all their sins<WH2403> into the depths<WH4688> of the sea.<WH3220>
You will give<WH5414> truth<WH571> to Jacob,<WH3290> and mercy<WH2617> to Abraham,<WH85> as you have sworn<WH7650> to our fathers<WH1> from the days<WH3117> of old.<WH6924>
